Class RescaleUtils

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.rescale.RescaleUtils
public class RescaleUtils extends Object
Class RescaleUtils is a support class for the resize of the Panes

    • rescaleToCenter

      public static void rescaleToCenter(javafx.scene.control.Control node, double width, double height, double y, double scale)
      Rescales a Control to always be at the center of the screen
      Parameters:
      node - The node to rescale
      width - The width of the node, unscaled
      height - The height of the node, unscaled
      y - The Y coordinate of the node, unscaled
      scale - The scale to apply
